Q.1)  Direction (1-5) Eight friends  P, Q, R, S, T, U, V & W are sitting around a circle facing the center. V is third to the right of Q & second to the left of R. Q is second to the left of T & immediate right of S. U is between Q & T. P is not at the left of R.
Who is exactly at left of S?

Q.4) What is the exact position of W?
Q.5) Who is second at right of S?
